entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
